subtitle: hi welcome to meaningful Monday's where
we answer your personal questions the
question this week is about special
children how can we make sense of the
existence of souls with special needs
such as those with mental challenges
this is one of the more painful topics
and God to bless everyone to have
healthy children and I have to deal with
this unique challenge at the same time
when a child is born with any particular
lack or handicap that we have to
remember that a soul is never
handicapped so though we don't
understand the mysteries of life we
don't understand the mysteries of why
some children are born in certain way
and others in a different way but we
have to always know that by virtue of
our soul a special child is exactly that
they may be lacking in one area but God
will always compensate and give them
strength in other areas and as parents
and educators and all of us have to be
uniquely sensitive to not look down at a
child like that to not to dismiss them
but on the contrary try to identify and
recognize the deeper strange that they
have and afford them the dignity that
every soul deserves again this is one of
the most painful and difficult areas of
life but families that have learned to
embrace a child with special needs
discover dimensions of love dimensions
of appreciation of life in ways that
others do not so a special child is not
just some type of cliche or Q term it
actually means there is a special
strength it's an opportunity for us to
embrace the mysteries of the soul
embrace the challenges that each of us
experience and come to discover the
deeper good the deeper love the lies
within such children God should bless
everyone to both deal with their
challenges and to have the healthiest
possible life and to deal with any
situation that comes our way this has
been meaningful Monday's where we answer
your personal questions if you'd like to
ask a question please submit it in the
link below
everyone have very meaningful week
you
